Application_Logic/Model/FileHandler.cs

00001 using System;
00002 using System.Collections;
00003 using System.Collections.Generic;
00004 using ApplicationLogic.Interfaces;
00005 using System.IO;
00006 using ApplicationLogic.Model;
00007 
00008 namespace ApplicationLogic
00009 {
00013     public class FileHandler<T> where T : ICSVSerializable<T>
00014     {
00015 
00016         public String ReadFilePath;
00017         public String WriteFilePath;
00018 
00019         public FileHandler()
00020         {
00021         }
00022 
00023         public FileHandler(String readFilePath, String writeFilePath)
00024         {
00025             this.ReadFilePath = readFilePath;
00026             this.WriteFilePath = writeFilePath;
00027         }
00028 
00034         public void SaveToFile(IList<T> elements)
00035         {
00036             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(this.WriteFilePath))
00037             {
00038                 FileStream writeFile = File.Open(WriteFilePath, FileMode.Create);
00039                 using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(writeFile))
00040                 {
00041                     foreach (T item in elements)
00042                     {
00043                         sw.Write(item.CsvRepresentation());
00044                         sw.Write("\n");
00045                     }
00046                 }
00047             }
00048             else
00049             {
00050                 throw new NoFilePathSetException("No file path to write to set.");
00051             }
00052 
00053         }
00054 
00061         public IList<T> LoadFromFile(T item)
00062         {
00063             if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(this.ReadFilePath))
00064             {
00065                 FileStream readFile = File.Open(ReadFilePath, FileMode.Open);
00066                 List<T> returnList = new List<T>();
00067                 using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(readFile))
00068                 {
00069                     String readString = "";
00070                     while ((readString = sr.ReadLine()) != null)
00071                     {
00072                         T t = item.ParseFromString(readString);
00073                         returnList.Add(t);
00074                     }
00075                 }
00076                 return returnList;
00077             }
00078             else
00079             {
00080                 throw new NoFilePathSetException("No file path to write to set.");
00081             }
00082         }
00083     }
00084 }
